extras.old_content:
101    def forward(self, rep_anchor: torch.Tensor, rep_positive: torch.Tensor, rep_negative: torch.Tensor):
    102        pass
extras.new_content:
101    def forward(self, rep_anchor: torch.Tensor, rep_positive: torch.Tensor, rep_negative: torch.Tensor):
        # Implements Eq. (3) in the paper: L_cluster = max(d_c(e, e+) - d_c(e, e-) + margin, 0)
        d_pos = self.manifold.dist(rep_anchor, rep_positive)
        d_neg = self.manifold.dist(rep_anchor, rep_negative)
        loss = torch.clamp(d_pos - d_neg + self.margin, min=0.0)
        return loss.mean()
